title: Ctrip.Com Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q2
text:
Ctrip.Com Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q2

Stock Markets 46 minutes ago (Sep 10, 2019 03:04AM ET)

© Reuters. Ctrip.Com Earnings, Revenue Beat in Q2 Investing.com - Ctrip.Com reported second quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Monday and revenue that topped forecasts. The firm reported earnings per share of ¥ 2.25 on revenue of ¥ 8.69B. Analysts polled by Investing.com anticipated EPS of ¥ 2.07 on revenue of ¥ 8.64B. . The company had reported EPS of ¥ 2.93 on revenue of ¥ 8.16B in the previous quarter. Ctrip.Com follows other major Services sector earnings this month On August 15, Alibaba ADR reported first quarter EPS of $12.55 on revenue of $114.92B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $10.3 on revenue of $111.83B. Walmart earnings beat analyst's expectations on August 15, with second quarter EPS of $1.27 on revenue of $130.4B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $1.22 on revenue of $130.1B Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
